casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Application of Charles Edmond DAVIS, Situate in Waikiki, Honolulu, Oahu. In re Petitioners Lily Tai Nomura, Richard Y.S. Lee, Long Life Foundation, a Hawaii non-profit corporation, and Aloha Rainbow Investments, a Hawaii corporation affecting Transfer Certificate of Title Nos. 1053288 and 182404 NO. CAAP-15-0000442 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. February 28, 2019

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Vacated. Remanded.
